name: Slack to Hipchat Notifications Webook
description: A service to notificate an hipchat room from a slack webook

NOTIFICATION_COLOR.description: Background color for message. Valid values: yellow, green, red, purple, gray, random

NOTIFICATION_NOTIFY.description: Whether a message should trigger a user notification. Valid values: true, false

NOTIFICATION_USERNAME.description: name for which the message will be presented as from
